page.title: 08CASTLETOWN HEALTH-HERBALISM
page.content: { }Close to the village of{Castletown} lives Mr Brian Lamb,the only professional{herbalist}in{Scotland.} Mr Lamb obtains the raw ingredients for his medicines from many parts of the world as well as collecting them from the local hedgerows. As all herbalists do,Mr Lamb treats the whole person rather than one or two symptoms.People consult him for many different complaints but the most common reason for his patients'visits is problems with their nervous system. The herbs have to be dried and ground and then stored in brown jars in alcohol.The medicines are mixed according to the individual needs of each patient.Being the only professional herbalist in Scotland,Mr Lamb's patients come from as far away as Edinburgh and Glasgow.
